com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.manager.listeners

Interface IBeaconListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleIBeaconListener

    public interface IBeaconListener
    Listener used to report iBeacon scanning results.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onIBeaconDiscovered(IBeaconDevice iBeacon, IBeaconRegion region)
      Called when iBeacon is discovered for the first time.
      void onIBeaconLost(IBeaconDevice iBeacon, IBeaconRegion region)
      Called when iBeacon is reported lost (out of range). onIBeaconDiscovered will be called when beacon is back in range.
      void onIBeaconsUpdated(java.util.List<IBeaconDevice> iBeacons, IBeaconRegion region)
      Called when iBeacons are updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onIBeaconDiscovered

        void onIBeaconDiscovered(IBeaconDevice iBeacon,
                         IBeaconRegion region)
        Called when iBeacon is discovered for the first time. This will be called only once per scan or after beacon is reported lost.
        Parameters:
        iBeacon - IBeaconDevice instance.
        region - IBeaconRegion instance.

      • onIBeaconsUpdated

        void onIBeaconsUpdated(java.util.List<IBeaconDevice> iBeacons,
                       IBeaconRegion region)
        Called when iBeacons are updated.
        Parameters:
        iBeacons - List of updated IBeaconDevice devices.
        region - IBeaconRegion instance.

      • onIBeaconLost

        void onIBeaconLost(IBeaconDevice iBeacon,
                   IBeaconRegion region)
        Called when iBeacon is reported lost (out of range). onIBeaconDiscovered will be called when beacon is back in range.
        Parameters:
        iBeacon - Lost IBeaconDevice instance.
        region - IBeaconRegion instance.
